# Ejercicio 1

## Apartado 1
```{r setup, echo = FALSE}
rm(list = ls())
```
```{r}
boxplot(Solar.R ~ Month, data = airquality, names = month.name[5:9])
```

## Apartados 2 y 3

```{r}
plot(airquality$Solar.R, airquality$Ozone,
    xlab = "Radiación solar", ylab = "Concentración de ozono"
)
modelo <- lm(Ozone ~ Solar.R, data = airquality)
abline(modelo)
```


# Ejercicio 2

## Apartado 1
```{r}
nsim <- 1000
set.seed(1)
U <- runif(nsim)
a <- 5
b <- 4

f <- function(x) (a * b^a) / (x^(a + 1))
F <- function(x) 1 - (b / x)^a

Finv <- function(u) b / (1 - u)^(1 / a)

X <- Finv(U)
```

## Apartado 2

```{r}
hist(X, freq = FALSE, breaks = "FD")
lines(density(X), col = "blue")
ks.test(X, F)
```
